plot: Two former photojournalists bring a large format camera to South-East Asia to portray Asian elephants living in captivity and to record their biographies.
title: Life Size Memories
plot_es: Two former photojournalists bring a large format camera to South-East Asia to portray Asian elephants living in captivity and to record their biographies.
plot_en: Two former photojournalists bring a large format camera to South-East Asia to portray Asian elephants living in captivity and to record their biographies.
